mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.Name, a.DisplayName, a.IsDefault FROM AbpRoles a INNER JOIN abpuserroles b ON a.Id = b.RoleId WHERE a.IsDeleted = 0 AND b.UserId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select b.id roleId, b.roleLevel, a.organId, c.organName, c.organPath from UserManageOrgnizationMap a inner join AbpRoles b on a.roleid = b.id inner join Organization c on a.organid = c.id where b.IsDeleted = 0 and c.IsDeleted = 0 and a.UserId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.Id, a.`Group`, a.Type, a.ParentId, a.PermissionName, a.DisplayName, a.Description, a.Url, a.IconPath, a.ClassName, a.Sort, a.Tags, a.Tags1 FROM menubutton a LEFT JOIN menubuttonrolesetting b ON b.MenuButtonId = a.Id WHERE b.RoleId = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.IsDeleted = 0
